name: Ecosia - Google style 2019 (No ads!) Theme
description:
Styles Ecosia with virtually the same look as google - this style also removes product ads, and search-result ads.

The style itself is a fairly subtle change, but makes a surprisingly good difference to readability.

Up-to-date with 2019 Ecosia - Tested on Firefox & Chrome
Doesn't work in Ecosia mobile mode.
